content: The Annihilation Wave’s course of destruction ran directly through her region, it is unknown how many of her worlds have fell victim to the Wave’s genocidal destruction. It has been confirmed that the Super Skrull, Kl’rt came to her seeking aid against the planet-destroying Harvester of Sorrows, which was created by the Negative Zone scientist Hawal.This weapon of mass destruction destroyed the Skrull planet of Aks’lo within the Star System 004. What exactly happened at that meeting is still unclear, but apparently, S’bak refused the Super-Skrulls request to mount an attack against the Harvester of Sorrow. The Baroness was unwilling to leave herself open to an attack from a rival Warlord, by fighting a super weapon that no one knew how to destroy quickly.S’Bak then called the Super Skrull a laughingstock and an embarrassment to the entire Skrull Empire. She described his exploits as cautionary tales of failure. After constantly being, insulted Kl’rt punched the Baroness hard in the mouth, leading her to order her troops to kill him for treason. Kl’rt escaped the Baroness and her soldiers. He continued to search for allies against the Harvester of Sorrows. The Baroness put up a bounty of three million, golden z’lacks for the capture of the Super Skrull dead or alive.
hair: Unrevealed, but she has two short horns on her head
identity: Unknown to the inhabitants of Earth
publicly known in the Skrull Empire
powers: She has the natural shapeshifting abilities of those of her race. It is unknown as to how proficient she is with these abilities.
